articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets Indonesian Ambassador
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets Indonesian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun met and had a talk with Daulat Hotma Audison Passaribu, Indonesian ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a farewell call on him on Tuesday.

articles.title: WPK Delegation Leaves for China
articles.content:
WPK Delegation Leaves for China
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the International Affairs Department of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea led by its Director Kim Yong Il left here for China today by air.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations and Guest Here
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations and Guest Here
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Foreign Ministry of Romania headed by Director General Gheorghe Magheru and a government economic delegation of Vietnam headed by Bui Suan Khu, vice-minister of Industry and Commerce, arrived here on Tuesday.
					Also arriving here on the same day was Eric Laroche, assistant director-general of the World Health Organization.

articles.title: Russian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- A reception was co-hosted by Valery Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and Aleksei Bartusov, military attache of the Russian embassy here, to mark the "Day of Defenders of the Motherland" at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Feb. 22.
					 Present there on invitation were Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, and general officers and officers of the Korean People's Army and officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of different countries here and military attaches of foreign embassies here.
					
					 On hand were Russian embassy officials.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Indonesian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Indonesian Ambassador Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Daulat Hotma Audison Passaribu, Indonesian ambassador to the DPRK, Monday hosted a reception on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary
					 Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Kim Wan Su, vice-chairman of the SPA, Kim Song Nam, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.
					
					 On hand were staff members of the Indonesian embassy here.
					
					 Daulat Hotma Audison Passaribu made a speech at the reception.
					
					 He said that the February holiday was celebrated in the significant year marking the 45th anniversary of the historic Indonesian visit paid by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 He expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Indonesia based on a solid foundation would continue to expand and develop in the common interests of the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop said in his speech that the birth of Kim Jong Il as a lodestar of Mt. Paektu was a great auspicious event as it promised the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche and a rosy future of the country.
					
					He referred to the fact that the friendly relations between the DPRK and Indonesia provided by
						 Kim Il Sung and Sukarno have favorably developed day by day under the deep care of the top leaders of the two countries.
					
					 The DPRK will strive to boost the relations with Indonesia in different fields in the future, too, he stressed.

articles.title: Palestinian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Palestinian Ambassador Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan Monday gave a reception at the embassy in celebration of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there on invitation were Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun, Vice Department Director of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee Ri Yong Chol, Vice-Minister of Public Health Ri Pong Hun, Vice-Chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries Mun Jae Chol and officials concerned.
					
					 Staff members of the Palestinian embassy were on hand.
					
					 The ambassador, addressing the reception, said that Kim Jong Il is wisely leading the efforts of the Korean people to open the gate to a thriving socialist nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Under his guidance they are effecting a new leap forward and innovations in all fields this year marking the 65th anniversary of the WPK, he said.
					
					 The friendly relations between Palestine and the DPRK are growing stronger under the deep care of Mahmoud Abbas and Kim Jong Il, he said, adding that the leadership and people of Palestine would as ever extend support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just cause.
					
					 Pak in his reply said that Kim Jong Il has led the revolution and construction to victory, performing undying feats on behalf of the country and its people, the times and history.
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the DPRK government to boost the friendly relations between the two countries provided by President Kim Il Sung and President Yasser Arafat, he noted.
					
					 The DPRK will send invariable support to the just cause of the Palestinian people to retake legitimate national rights including the right to found an independent state with Kuds as its capital, he stressed.

articles.title: Nationwide March for Reunification Called for
articles.content:
Nationwide March for Reunification Called for
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- It is beyond any doubt that a decisive turning point will be brought about in the movement for independent reunification and peace and prosperity when all the Korean people turn out as one in the grand nationwide march for reunification despite all challenges of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad, bearing deep in mind the mission before the times and history in response to the appeal of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The organization in its appeal set forth specific tasks for implementing the slogan "Let the entire nation unite under the banner of north-south joint declarations and achieve national reunification at the earliest date!", the slogan contained in the joint editorial this year. This is quite just and realistic. 
					
					 Independent reunification and peace and prosperity would be unthinkable without national reconciliation and cooperation. 
					
					 It is possible to achieve independent reunification and peace and prosperity only when Koreans from all walks of life at home and abroad join hands, irrespective of ideology, political view and religion, to actively realize national reconciliation and earnestly revitalize visits, contacts and multi-faced cooperation. 
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration are important programmes reflecting the Korean people's ardent desire for national reunification and indicating clear strategy and ways for achieving independent reunification. 
					
					 The path of "By our nation itself," the road of national independence indicated by the north-south joint declarations, is the permanent way to be followed by the Koreans. 
					
					 The only way of independently and peacefully solving the Korean nation's issue of reunification is to found the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo. 
					
					 No force on earth can hold in check the grand march of the Koreans for reunification under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration. 
					
					 All the Koreans at home and abroad should turn out as one, firmly convinced of the victory of the cause of independent reunification, and glorify this year marking the 10th anniversary of the publication of the historic June 15 joint declaration as a year of bringing about a fresh turn in the country's reunification.

articles.title: Japan's Moves to Grab Tok Islets Blasted
articles.content:
Japan's Moves to Grab Tok Islets Blasted
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Members of the Solidarity for Protecting Tok Islets of south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on Feb. 19 denouncing Japan's moves to grab Tok Islets, according to south Korean KBS.
					 They accused Japan of tampering with its history of aggression and working hard to grab Tok Islets, far from making an apology for fabricating the brigandish "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" 100 years ago, establishing colonial domination and perpetrating plunder and mass killings.
					
					 Noting that they can not repress indignation at the plan of Shimane Prefecture, Japan to hold what it called "commemoration event" on the occasion of the "Day of Takeshima" which falls on Feb. 22 every year, they declared they would stage a protest to hold it in check.
					
					 They urged the prefecture to abolish the day at once.

articles.title: Colombian Organization Lauds Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Colombian Organization Lauds Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- A bulletin titled "Kim Jong Il, Leader of Decision" was issued by the Colombia-Korea Association of Friendship and Culture on Feb. 13 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The bulletin in an article said: The reality of socialist Korea winning only victories courageously meeting all challenges of history would be unthinkable without Kim Jong Il's decision. He is possessed of the disposition of making a bold decision without hesitation under any circumstances and once he is determined to do something, he puts it into practice without fail.
					
					 His determination can be found in making a correct decision on the crucial issues related to the dignity of the country and the destiny of the nation.
					
					 The bulletin referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il adopted the Songun policy as a main political mode under socialism to cope with the grim situation that prevailed at the end of the last century, bringing about a turning phase in building a thriving nation and provided the inter-Korean summit, the first of its kind in 55 years since the national split with his great patriotic bold decision, making sure that the June 15 joint declaration, a landmark of Korea's reunification, was adopted.
					
					 The above-said decision can be noticed in the fact that he has led the showdown with the U.S. and socialist construction to victory, it added.

articles.title: Joint Statement Supported in Britain
articles.content:
Joint Statement Supported in Britain
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on Feb. 10 released a joint statement in support of the joint statement issued by the Ministry of People's Security and the Ministry of State Security of the DPRK.
					 The statement recalled that the south Korean puppet clique is desperately working to bring down socialist Korea by mobilizing the "National Intelligence Service", the "Defense Security Command" and other spy and plot-breeding organizations and such government institutions as the "Ministry of Unification", adding that these acts are intolerable. 
					
					 It expressed positive support for the joint statement issued for the purpose of foiling the ridiculous anti-DPRK moves of the south Korean puppet clique and resolutely defending the socialist system centered on the popular masses and extended firm solidarity to the Korean people in their just struggle to do so.
					
					 Meanwhile, the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain issued a statement on Feb. 13 supporting the joint statement.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Observed in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Observed in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Bangladesh, South Africa, Bulgaria and Switzerland between Feb. 12 and 15 in celebration of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					 Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, and Hasanul Huq Inu, chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, noted that thanks to the original Songun policy of Kim Jong Il peace and stability are being preserved on the Korean Peninsula and the DPRK has turned into a military power which no formidable enemy dares provoke.
					
					 Bonakele Majuba, secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party who is chairman of the South African Association of Friendship and Solidarity with Korean People, said that under the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Il the DPRK made signal successes startling the world as evidenced by its successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-2, perfection of the Juche iron production system and mass-production of vinalon cotton. This is a stirring reality one can witness only in the DPRK guided by the Juche idea, he stressed.
					
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, spoke highly of the feats performed by Kim Jong Il in the movement for Korea's reunification. He expressed full sympathy with the statement of the DPRK Foreign Ministry calling for replacing the Korean Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty and extended positive support to the Korean people in their cause of achieving the reunification of the country and building a thriving nation.
					
					 Messages of greetings to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meetings held in Bulgaria and Switzerland.
					
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, in a statement issued on Feb. 15 said that it is   Kim Jong Il's unique mode of leading the masses to always find himself among the people, share the destiny with them and energetically arouse them to the revolution and construction.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Observed in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Observed in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The Tynda City Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Russian Philosophy Association opened its internet homepage "Whole Korea" on Feb. 10 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The homepage introduced in detail the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence and their noble popular personalities and Korea's history spanning 5,000 years and its brilliant culture.
					
					 Posted on the homepage were a picture of Mt. Paektu, a holy mountain of the revolution, a photo of a panoramic view of Pyongyang and files on the real picture of Songun Korea and others.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Finland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Finland
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Having a Correct Understanding on Nationalism" was brought out in booklet by the Finnish Communists' Association and the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on Feb. 14.
					 This work is a talk of Kim Jong Il to leading officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on Feb. 26 and 28, Juche 91 (2002).
					
					 The work deals with the formation and development of nationalism and the essence of genuine nationalism and its progressive nature, and tasks to preserve the national identity and defend and realize independence of the nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia la funcion artistica de estudiantes capitalinos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia la funcion artistica de estudiantes capitalinos
Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presencio la funcion de los grupos artisticos de los estudiantes de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, la Universidad Pedagogica Kim Hyong Jik, la Universidad Pedagogica Kim Chol Ju, la Universidad de Medicina de Pyongyang, la Universidad de la Construccion y de sus Materiales de Pyongyang, la Universidad de Maquinaria de Pyongyang, la Universidad de Agricultura de Pyongyang y la Universidad de Comercio Jang Chol Gu de Pyongyang.
					En el repertorio de la ocasion figuraron las piezas de diferentes generos como la poesia en narracion y coro "!Corea, te hare grande!", la cancion acompanada de kayagum "No existe en el mundo tal hombre como el Lider", el coro femenino "Recuerdo de la isba natal", el coro masculino "Se ve la gran potencia prospera", la charla comica "Nuestra moral", la poesia y el coro "!Que conquiste la tecnologia de punta!".
					
					A traves de la funcion, los ejecutantes cantaron en tono emotivo el gran orgullo y la felicidad de ellos mismos que estudian a sus anchas sin tener nada que envidiar en el mundo en el regazo afectuoso del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Igualmente, mostraron patentemente la firme conviccion y la voluntad de los estudiantes de llevar a feliz termino de generacion en generacion la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada en el Paektu marchando siempre en pos del partido.
					
					El Dirigente aprecio altamente el exito de la funcion y expreso agradecimiento a los estudiantes en nombre del Comite Central del PTC mostrandose muy satisfecho de que ellos hayan ofrecido esta magnifica funcion, en que palpita el espiritu revolucionario de los militares, con las obras de gran valor cognoscitivo y educativo, que reflejan vividamente la vida estudiantil, imitando la cultura de los militares creada en la epoca del Songun.
					
					Los revolucionarios y combativos estudiantes coreanos son verdaderos vanguardistas juveniles que apoyan invariablemente al partido con la fidelidad inmaculada bajo cualesquier dificultades y pruebas, senalo y subrayo que contar con las nuevas generaciones dignas de confianza como ellos constituye un gran orgullo de nuestro partido.
					
					Evaluo altamente los exitos logrados anteriormente por las universidades destacando que el PTC esta satisfecho de que ellas hayan hecho gran aporte al cumplimiento de la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera formando numerosos cuadros nacionales y tecnicos talentosos, que desempenan el papel nuclear en la revolucion y la construccion, al desplegar con energia la lucha por materializar cabalmente la "Tesis sobre la Educacion Socialista" presentada por el Presidente
						 Kim Il Sung.
					
					Presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en la ensenanza y la educacion de los planteles de educacion superior subrayando que formar bien a las nuevas generaciones, que se encargaran del futuro de la patria, como personal util dotado de ricos conocimientos, nobles virtudes y buena salud y trabajadores dignos del pais, es el problema fundamental relacionado con el porvenir de la revolucion coreana.
					
					El Dirigente estuvo acompanado en esta ocasion por el secretario Choe Thae Bok, la jefa de departamento Kim Kyong Hui, los primeros subjefes de departamento, Ju Kyu Chang, Ri Je Gang y Ri Jae Il, y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Yun Kwang Sop
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Yun Kwang Sop
Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il envio el dia 22 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Yun Kwang Sop, Actor del Pueblo del Conjunto Circense de Pyongyang, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Conferencia nacional de periodistas y hombres de prensa
articles.content:
Conferencia nacional de periodistas y hombres de prensa
Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 22 en esta capital la conferencia nacional de periodistas y hombres de prensa. 
					 Participaron Kim Yong Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Jong Gak, Kim Jung Rin, Kim Ki Nam, los funcionarios de la prensa e informacion, los periodistas, los redactores, los locutores, los funcionarios de la rama de la labor ideologica del partido y los periodistas y hombres de prensa de la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos en Japon). 
					
					Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, transmitio el mensaje del Dirigente
						 Kim Jong Il "Los periodistas y los hombres de prensa son trompeteros de marcha en la batalla por la construccion de la gran potencia prospera", enviado a los participantes en el conclave.
					
					 En su misiva el Dirigente ilumino claramente las tareas y remedios para lograr un nuevo cambio en la rama de prensa e informacion de la epoca del Songun, conforme a la demanda de la revolucion y la realidad en desarrollo. 
					
					 El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Ki Nam.
					
					 El informante recordo que el Dirigente preparo el gran programa inmortal a ser mantenido en la rama de la prensa e informacion, basandose en la idea autoctona y las proezas del Presidente Kim Il Sung realizadas en esta rama, y condujo sabiamente las  publicaciones de nuestro partido para que estas desempenaran satisfactoriamente el papel de poderosa arma ideologica. 
					
					 La gran orientacion del Dirigente sobre la prensa se puso de pleno manifiesto en el curso en que el practicaba globalmente la politica de Songun, dijo y agrego que los periodistas y los hombres de prensa frustraron la ofensiva ideologica reaccionaria de los imperialistas con la otra revolucionaria y exaltaron sin reserva el poderio de la pluma en la batalla decisiva por abrir el camino de avance de  la construccion de la gran potencia prospera. 
					
					Tenemos la tarea de anticipar la construccion de la gran potencia prospera explotando al maximo la fuerza espiritual de nuestro ejercito y pueblo, destaco y anadio que todos los periodistas y los hombres de prensa deben ser los abanderados ideologicos capaces de hacer brillar eternamente la idea y las hazanas de guia del Dirigente y consolidar aun mas la unidad monolitica de las filas revolucionarias.
					
					Ademas, han de contribuir a que se cumpla cuanto antes la causa de reunificacion de la patria bajo la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur y con las fuerzas unidas de todos los coreanos y a que se defiendan firmemente los sanos aspectos ideo-politicos y el modo de vida de nuestra sociedad desde los desafios de todo tipo y la ofensiva contrarrevolucionaria de los imperialistas, concluyo.
					
					El redactor en jefe de la Editora del Periodico Rodong Sinmun, Kim Ki Ryong, el director general de la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea, Kim Pyong Ho, y otros oradores subrayaron que todos los participantes deben hacer mas calido el ambiente por producir grandes innovaciones y saltos con el poderio de la pluma aceptando con el corazon el historico mensaje del Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Ratificaron que todos los periodistas y hombres de prensa cumpliran magnificamente con su honrosa mision y deber de vanguardistas ideologicos y primeros trompeteros de marcha en el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama a sumarse a la gran marcha pannacional
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama a sumarse a la gran marcha pannacional
Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ATCC) -- Se abrira indudablemente la coyuntura decisiva de la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad cuando todos los coreanos, en respuesta al llamamiento del Comite Norteno por la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, se levanten en la gran marcha pannacional hacia la reunificacion rechazando con valentia todos los desafios de las fuerzas internas y externas opositoras a la reunificacion en cumplimiento de su mision asumida ante la epoca y la historia.
					 Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual del dia 23 y continua:
					
					Resulta muy justo y realista que ese comite norteno haya presentado en su llamamiento las tareas concretas para poner en practica la consigna "!Logremos cuanto antes la reunificacion de la Patria, con la unidad de toda la nacion, bajo la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur!", presentada en el editorial conjunto de los periodicos Rodong Sinmun, Joson Inmingun y Chongnyon Jonwi difundido con motivo del ano nuevo.
					
					Sin la reconciliacion y cooperacion nacionales no se puede pensar en la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad.
					
					Estas tras metas seran alcanzadas cuando todos los sectores del interior y exterior del pais se tomen de las manos por encima de las diferencias de la idea, el ideal, el criterio politico y la creencia religiosa para dinamizar la reconciliacion nacional, el viaje reciproco, el contacto y la cooperacion multilateral.
					
					 La Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre reflejan la fuerte aspiracion y el deseo de la reunificacion de la nacion coreana y devienen el programa comun de ella sobre este tema que aclaro claramente las estrategias y remedios para conseguir la reunificacion independiente.
					
					 El camino a seguir por los coreanos ha sido y sera siempre la senda de "Entre nosotros, los connacioanles", o sea, la de independencia nacional indicada por dichos documentos intercoreanos.
					
					 La fundacion de la Republica Federal Democratica de Coryo deviene el unico camino para solucionar por via independiente y pacifica el problema de reunificacion de la nacion coreana.
					
					 No se puede bloquear por nada la gran marcha de reunificacion que emprenden los coreanos bajo la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre. 
					
					Todos los compatriotas dentro y fuera del pais deben levantarse unanimemente con gran fe en el triunfo de la causa de reunificacion independiente para convertir este ano del 10o aniversario de publicacion de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio en el que propicie la nueva coyuntura para la reunificacion de la patria.
